title: Alagnak Wild River: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       For more frequent Alagnak updates follow us on Twitter at KatmaiNPS. (The park does not maintain a separate Twitter account for the Alagnak Wild River.) Be sure to visit the newspaper page on Katmai National Park and Preserve's website and download the latest edition of The Novarupta, the official newspaper of Alagnak Wild River, Aniakchak National Monument and Preserve, and Katmai National Park and Preserve (go.nps.gov/novarupta_newspaper). Current Press Releases can be found here.
